subject: Welcome to Our Service
body: Hello, Thank you for joining us. We are excited to have you on board.

subject: Password Reset Request
body: Click the link below to reset your password.

subject: Subscription Renewal Reminder
body: Your subscription is about to expire. Renew now to continue enjoying our services.

subject: Order Confirmation
body: Thank you for your order. Your order number is #12345.

subject: Shipping Notification
body: Your order has been shipped. You can track your order using the tracking number prov_ided.

subject: Account Deactivation
body: Your account has been deactivated due to inactivity. Contact support to reactivate.

subject: Feedback Request
body: We value your feedback. Please take a moment to complete our survey.

subject: Special Offer Just for You
body: Enjoy a special discount on your next purchase. Use code SPECIAL20 at checkout.

subject: Newsletter - July Edition
body: Catch up on the latest news and updates in our July newsletter.

subject: Event Invitation
body: Join us for our upcoming event. RSVP by clicking the link below.
